V

validateUserOption(int, int) - Static method in class Main
Gets input and ensures it is between min and max input values
viewAllProjects() - Static method in class Main
View all Projects Lists all projects in projectList, giving options to search for particular projects as well as listing incomplete / overdue projects.
viewIncompleteProjects() - Static method in class Main
Lists incomplete projects Checks finalised value of project and lists it if false.
viewOverdueProjects() - Static method in class Main
Lists overdue projects, if they are also not completed.
viewPerson(Person) - Static method in class Main
Displays details of the person(customer, architect, contractor, etc).
viewSelectedProject(Project) - Static method in class Main
Views the selected project Prints out project's details, then provides options to change the details of the project, the customer, the architect or the contractor, or finalise the project.
